name: Shannon Sharpe Game
description:
This is 'Shannon Sharpe Game', a new video game from Outhouse Media. This time you are the monster from a Power Ninja themed video game series. You'll be entering an arena of battle with a team of other players. You will not want to leave the arena! You may only climb the tower and collect the hearts of your opponents.
Soon after a player reaches the top of the tower you'll be greeted by a boss monster, the Master of the Tower. You'll be given the choice of fighting your way through the battles or taking control of the tower and using its powerful lights to your advantage. You will have to have a good strategy, picking and choosing from your choices, so you don't get to die over and over again. Only defeat boss monsters to earn the secret World of Wonder Coins. You will soon find yourself here, at the top of the world of Wonder, where you may find the SONY EMBLEM! Back to Top The Wizard of New Wardrobe Blind Squirrel Blind Squirrel is a strategy dog-dog game, in which a game-master makes a game of finding blind squirrels, and putting them in his/her DOG CAGE. Kathy Noyes aka. The Wizard of New Wardrobe goes into detail about the setting, surrounding changes and the game's story. Blind Squirrel is a game for 2-4 players, ages 8+ and requires a minimum of 2 players. Blind
